definition: station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: Hong Kong Air Cargo Terminals Limited is one of the leading air cargo terminal operators in the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港空運貨站是世界領先的航空貨運站之一。

sentences.english: It indicated that air pollution of DCARTS had direct mutagenesis.
sentences.chinese: 提示我們危貨站空氣污染物具有直接遺傳毒性作用。

sentences.english: If so, have the Port Authority and terminal authority been informed?
sentences.chinese: 如果要洗艙，是否已通知港口當局及裝卸液貨站？

sentences.english: The PHM DLs of cement warehouse, Nan-Kang Cargo Station.
sentences.chinese: 南港貨站水泥倉的北晟重機凸形調車機羣。
